title: Sky in Your Heart
overview: The show is about the encounter between two strangers that forever changes their hearts, about the love of two people who are different. Immediate social service in the north leads Dr. Kuafah to meet Prince, a volunteer teacher there. The two despise one another from the second their first meet. Even so, the more they argue, the more they get to understand each other. In the midst of a romantic mountaintop setting, how will the love of these two distinct individuals blossom? Get on board and find out together.
